Interface User

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserImpl

    public interface User
    Author:
    Zack Pollard

      Gets the first name of the User.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        long getId()
        Gets the ID of the User
        Returns:
        The ID of the User

      • getFirstName

        java.lang.String getFirstName()
        Gets the first name of the User.
        Returns:
        The users first name, currently can be null due to chat creation of individual chats by ID with no way of getting the users name from telegram servers.

      • getLastName

        java.lang.String getLastName()
        Gets the last name of the User
        Returns:
        The last name of the User or null if no last name is provided

      • getFullName

        default java.lang.String getFullName()
        Gets the full name of the user (concatenates the first and last name with a space in the middle, and then trims
        Returns:
        The full name of the user

      • getUsername

        java.lang.String getUsername()
        Gets the username for the User
        Returns:
        The username for the User, or null if none is provided

      • getProfilePhotos

        UserProfilePhotos getProfilePhotos(TelegramBot telegramBot)
        Gets the profile photos for the User
        Parameters:
        telegramBot - The TelegramBot instance that should retrieve the profile photos
        Returns:
        The UserProfilePhotos for the User
